description:
Smooth parcels in a volume separately.

The volume is smoothed within each label in the label volume using data only from within the label.  Equivalent to running volume smoothing with ROIs matching each label separately, then adding the resulting volumes, but faster.

label_volume.title: label_volume
label_volume.description: a label volume containing the parcels to smooth

kernel.title: kernel
kernel.description: the size of the gaussian smoothing kernel in mm, as sigma by default

opt_fwhm.title: opt_fwhm
opt_fwhm.description: smoothing kernel size is FWHM, not sigma

opt_fix_zeros.title: opt_fix_zeros
opt_fix_zeros.description: treat zero values as not being data

opt_subvolume_subvol.title: opt_subvolume_subvol
opt_subvolume_subvol.description: select a single subvolume to smooth: the subvolume number or name
